summary: Fixes the camera height in first person view
descriptionHtml:
Name: First Person Fix
Version: 1.0
Date: 1/18/2012
Category: Miscellaneous
Author(s): SoberBarn

Description
===========
Ever get sick of playing a Nord or Orc and looking at the middle of other races\' chests? Me too, so I made this mod just for you. This was an easy fix and I was happy to do it for all of you who may not have known how to do this or even know it was possible.


Details
=======
This mod was calibrated using a Kajhiit set at a scale of 1.04, though I\'m pretty sure that is the height of a standard Nord or Orc. That being said this perfect for playing a Cathay-raht Kajhiit. Enjoy.

Also, in order for third and first person views to line up, insert this line into the bottom of your Skyrim.ini

[Camera]
fOverShoulderCombatPosZ=7.5000
fOverShoulderPosZ=7.5000

If this proves to be too difficult, I can add another file to do it for you.

Install
=======
Just unzip the \"meshes\" folder into your \"Skyrim/Data\" directory.

Uninstall
=========
Why?

Well if you insist just delete \"skeleton.nif\" from \"Meshes/Actors/Character/_1stPerson\"

Change Log
=======
1.0 - Initial release.

Incompatibility
===============
Anything that also alters \"skeleton.nif\"

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None yet, however let me know if you find something.


Contact
=======
